description: A h3cEponPortAlarmBerTrap notification is sent when
a BER threshold crossing event is detected.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD H3C-EPON-MIB::h3cEponPortAlarmBerTrap IF-MIB::ifIndex i 9999 IF-MIB::ifDescr s EXAMPLE H3C-EPON-MIB::h3cOltPortAlarmBerDirect i 1 H3C-EPON-MIB::h3cOltPortAlarmBer u 9999 H3C-EPON-MIB::h3cOltPortAlarmBerThreshold i 9999

description: A unique value, greater than zero, for each interface. It
is recommended that values are assigned contiguously
starting from 1. The value for each interface sub-layer
must remain constant at least from one re-initialization of
the entity's network management system to the next re-
initialization.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifIndex

description: A textual string containing information about the
interface. This string should include the name of the
manufacturer, the product name and the version of the
interface hardware/software.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifDescr

description: Traffic direction to monitor for BER alarm.

description: error bit rate.
variables.name: H3C-EPON-MIB::h3cOltPortAlarmBer

description: BER threshold exceed which the alarm is raised.
variables.name: H3C-EPON-MIB::h3cOltPortAlarmBerThreshold

description: A h3cEponPortAlarmFerTrap notification is sent when

description: A h3cEponOltDFERecoverTrap notification is sent when

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD H3C-EPON-MIB::h3cEponOltDFERecoverTrap IF-MIB::ifIndex i 9999 IF-MIB::ifDescr s EXAMPLE

description: A unique value, greater than zero, for each interface. It
is recommended that values are assigned contiguously
starting from 1. The value for each interface sub-layer
must remain constant at least from one re-initialization of
the entity's network management system to the next re-
initialization.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifIndex

description: A textual string containing information about the
interface. This string should include the name of the
manufacturer, the product name and the version of the
interface hardware/software.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifDescr

description: The h3cEponOnuSilenceTrap notification is sent when an
unbound ONU try to register to an OLT.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD H3C-EPON-MIB::h3cEponOnuSilenceTrap IF-MIB::ifIndex i 9999 IF-MIB::ifDescr s EXAMPLE H3C-EPON-MIB::h3cEponOnuRegSilentMac s EXAMPLE

description: A unique value, greater than zero, for each interface. It
is recommended that values are assigned contiguously
starting from 1. The value for each interface sub-layer
must remain constant at least from one re-initialization of
the entity's network management system to the next re-
initialization.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifIndex

description: A textual string containing information about the
interface. This string should include the name of the
manufacturer, the product name and the version of the
interface hardware/software.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifDescr

description: The MAC of silent ONU.
variables.name: H3C-EPON-MIB::h3cEponOnuRegSilentMac

description: The h3cEponOnuSilenceRecoverTrap notification is sent when
a silent ONU is bound in the OLT or the aging onu mac
address is timeout.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD H3C-EPON-MIB::h3cEponOnuSilenceRecoverTrap IF-MIB::ifIndex i 9999 IF-MIB::ifDescr s EXAMPLE H3C-EPON-MIB::h3cEponOnuRegSilentMac s EXAMPLE

description: A unique value, greater than zero, for each interface. It
is recommended that values are assigned contiguously
starting from 1. The value for each interface sub-layer
must remain constant at least from one re-initialization of
the entity's network management system to the next re-
initialization.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifIndex

description: A textual string containing information about the
interface. This string should include the name of the
manufacturer, the product name and the version of the
interface hardware/software.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifDescr

description: The MAC of silent ONU.
variables.name: H3C-EPON-MIB::h3cEponOnuRegSilentMac

description: A h3cEponUpdateResultTrap notification is sent when
an ONU reported its firmware update result.
tests: $SNMPTRAPCMD H3C-EPON-MIB::h3cEponOnuUpdateResultTrap IF-MIB::ifIndex i 9999 IF-MIB::ifDescr s EXAMPLE H3C-EPON-MIB::h3cOnuBindMacAddress s EXAMPL H3C-EPON-MIB::h3cOnuUpdateResult i 3 H3C-EPON-MIB::h3cOnuRegType s EXAMPLE H3C-EPON-MIB::h3cOnuUpdateFileName s EXAMPLE

$SNMPTRAPCMD H3C-EPON-MIB::h3cEponOnuUpdateResultTrap IF-MIB::ifIndex i 9999 IF-MIB::ifDescr s EXAMPLE H3C-EPON-MIB::h3cOnuBindMacAddress s EXAMPL H3C-EPON-MIB::h3cOnuUpdateResult i 2 H3C-EPON-MIB::h3cOnuRegType s EXAMPLE H3C-EPON-MIB::h3cOnuUpdateFileName s EXAMPLE

$SNMPTRAPCMD H3C-EPON-MIB::h3cEponOnuUpdateResultTrap IF-MIB::ifIndex i 9999 IF-MIB::ifDescr s EXAMPLE H3C-EPON-MIB::h3cOnuBindMacAddress s EXAMPL H3C-EPON-MIB::h3cOnuUpdateResult i 1 H3C-EPON-MIB::h3cOnuRegType s EXAMPLE H3C-EPON-MIB::h3cOnuUpdateFileName s EXAMPLE

description: A unique value, greater than zero, for each interface. It
is recommended that values are assigned contiguously
starting from 1. The value for each interface sub-layer
must remain constant at least from one re-initialization of
the entity's network management system to the next re-
initialization.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifIndex

description: A textual string containing information about the
interface. This string should include the name of the
manufacturer, the product name and the version of the
interface hardware/software.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifDescr

description: Bind the MAC of ONU.
While the MAC is not bound, the ONU can not go into
effect and configurations can not be set.
Set 0-0-0 (MAC address) to the EPON device port will
unbind the relationship with the original MAC and
configurations will be set to default values.
variables.name: H3C-EPON-MIB::h3cOnuBindMacAddress

description: The ONU firmware update result.
updating - The ONU is updating firmware right now.
ok - The ONU update result is OK.
fail - The ONU update result is fail.
fileNotExist - The ONU update failed because the file does not exist.
notSetFilename - The ONU firmware filename is not set.
fileNotMatchONU - The ONU firmware does not match the ONU.
timeout - The ONU responses timeout.
otherError - The ONU update result is unknown.
variables.name: H3C-EPON-MIB::h3cOnuUpdateResult

description: ONU registered type.
variables.name: H3C-EPON-MIB::h3cOnuRegType

description: The filename of the ONU firmware to be updated.
Note that the filename must contain the file path.
variables.name: H3C-EPON-MIB::h3cOnuUpdateFileName

description: A h3cEponOnuAutoBindTrap notification is sent
when a silent ONU is bound automatically.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD H3C-EPON-MIB::h3cEponOnuAutoBindTrap IF-MIB::ifIndex i 9999 IF-MIB::ifDescr s EXAMPLE H3C-EPON-MIB::h3cOnuBindMacAddress s EXAMPL H3C-EPON-MIB::h3cEponOperationResult s EXAMPLE

description: A textual string containing information about the
interface. This string should include the name of the

variables.name: H3C-EPON-MIB::h3cOnuBindMacAddress

description: The result of EPON operation.
variables.name: H3C-EPON-MIB::h3cEponOperationResult

description: A h3cEponOnuPortStpStateTrap notification is sent when
a port turns into another state in STP environment.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD H3C-EPON-MIB::h3cEponOnuPortStpStateTrap IF-MIB::ifIndex i 9999 IF-MIB::ifDescr s EXAMPLE H3C-EPON-MIB::h3cEponStpPortIndex i 0 H3C-EPON-MIB::h3cEponStpPortDescr s EXAMPLE H3C-EPON-MIB::h3cEponStpPortState i 1

description: A unique value, greater than zero, for each interface. It
is recommended that values are assigned contiguously
starting from 1. The value for each interface sub-layer
must remain constant at least from one re-initialization of
the entity's network management system to the next re-
initialization.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifIndex

description: A textual string containing information about the
interface. This string should include the name of the
manufacturer, the product name and the version of the
interface hardware/software.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifDescr

description: The index of the STP ports.
variables.name: H3C-EPON-MIB::h3cEponStpPortIndex

description: The description of the STP ports.
variables.name: H3C-EPON-MIB::h3cEponStpPortDescr

description: The current state of the port (i.e. disabled, discarding
learning and forwarding).
variables.name: H3C-EPON-MIB::h3cEponStpPortState

description: A h3cEponOnuLaserFailedTrap notification is sent when
an ONU has trouble with laser, such as laser constantly turned on
signal degradation or optics EOL (End of Life).
tests: $SNMPTRAPCMD H3C-EPON-MIB::h3cEponOnuLaserFailedTrap IF-MIB::ifIndex i 9999 IF-MIB::ifDescr s EXAMPLE H3C-EPON-MIB::h3cEponOnuLaserState i 4
$SNMPTRAPCMD H3C-EPON-MIB::h3cEponOnuLaserFailedTrap IF-MIB::ifIndex i 9999 IF-MIB::ifDescr s EXAMPLE H3C-EPON-MIB::h3cEponOnuLaserState i 1

description: The state of ONU laser.
variables.name: H3C-EPON-MIB::h3cEponOnuLaserState

description: A h3cOnuSmlkSwitchoverTrap notification is sent when
an ONU SMLK switchover is detected.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD H3C-EPON-MIB::h3cOnuSmlkSwitchoverTrap IF-MIB::ifIndex i 9999 IF-MIB::ifDescr s EXAMPLE H3C-EPON-MIB::h3cOnuSmlkGroupID i 9999 H3C-EPON-MIB::h3cOnuSmlkFirstPonStatus i 1 H3C-EPON-MIB::h3cOnuSmlkSecondPonStatus i 1
